column5: or drip tray/other container to hold 10 mL of water
or equivalent microcontroller that can output two independent 5V PWM signals and connect to PC over USB serial
Dimensions must be at least enough to cut out approx. four 6 cm x 8 cm rectangles, an A4 sheet is enough
Must be able to flash firmware to microcontroller and connect over USB serial to microcontroller and potentiostat
This can be substituted if you only plan to run water through the cell for testing things other than the chemistry
to accept 5 mm allen key or 10 mm hex socket
